name: Middle/Senior QA Engineer
description:
Who we are?

We are Enable U, the innovative digital integration expert. We enable organizations and companies to work efficiently by providing a secure and reliable way of communication among heterogeneous applications. For over fifteen years we have helped numerous organizations to improve their digital services, to save time and money and to create more value with our integration services.

Through digital integration people and organizations are more connected than ever! Our innovative technologies have made many integration services better and have significantly improved their efficiency and safety. Who are these specialists that make all of this possible? Our skilled and engaged Enablers!

Who are we looking for?

Enable U is looking for a Middle/Senior QA specialist to strengthen our team.

Responsibilities

  • Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases

  • Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs

  • Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved

  • Set up automated testing for our products, where applicable

  • Ensure high product quality during the testing phase and throughout the product life cycle

  • Ensure that the technical documentation for the products is complete and understandable

  • Work in close communication with Developers during the sprint cycle

Requirements

  • At least 2 years in web-testing (test-planning, test-design, regression and performance testing)

  • Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes

  • Ability to create detailed and well-structured test documentation (check lists, test cases) and bug description

  • Hands-on experience with at least one automated testing tool for middle tier (Postman, SOAPUI, etc) and for UI (Selenium, etc.)

  • Reasonable technical skills (understanding of SQL, XML, XPath, JSON, REST API, SOAP WebServices)

  • Knowledge of the STLC, testing methodologies, types and best practices

  • Understanding of Git version control system

  • Experience in Jira and Confluence

  • Understanding of software development methodologies (Agile: Scrum/Kanban)

  • Experience with API testing tools, sniffer tools, browser dev tools (Fiddler, Postman, Swagger)

  • Experience in using CI/CD processes on project and basic workflow understanding

  • Experience in testing in a Cloud environment

  • English level Intermediate +

  • Passion for product quality

  • Responsible and hard-working

  • High attention to details and solid analytical skills

In addition to a challenging position in a growing company, we also offer you:

  • Great team of professionals and just nice people, which create family atmosphere within the team

  • Trust to each other and respect to different opinions on whatever subject

  • Competitive salary

  • An attractive bonus scheme

  • Medical insurance

  • Paid sick leave

  • The English language courses

  • 25 calendar days paid vacation per year

  • Coffee, cookies, fruits in the office.

  • Opportunities for self-realization and growth

Are you that professional who wants to apply his/her knowledge & experience in an organization where you really matter? Then join our team of Enablers!
